markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of the Pampered Pet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2294)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Extradimensional" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=67" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 143 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 75 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This extravagant wand is made of gold and capped with a large, sparkling gemstone. Its handle is wrapped in plush, padded fabric.

<document level="2" id="action-1843" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _pet cache_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wand of the Pampered Pet
